message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $14,000. This is a special offer considering its value to you is $12,000. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits of the product while leaving room for you to see significant value in it.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm very interested in the product but $14,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $10,500?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to make this deal more appealing, I would like to propose an offer of $11,500 for the product. This price still allows us to cover our costs and provides some margin, while also being more accessible to you.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000.  This would be a fair compromise and allow us both to walk away happy.
